detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Folk (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#80-201) has payable functions:
	 - Folk.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#189-191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Folk](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Folk.sol#L80-L201) has payable functions:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
